instructions: Image titled Allow Pop ups Step 55 1 Open your iPhone's Image titled Iphonesettingsappicon.png Settings. This app is grey with gears on it. You'll usually find it on the Home Screen. Image titled Allow Pop ups Step 56 2 Scroll down and tap . It's about a third of the way down the Settings page. Image titled Allow Pop ups Step 57 3 Scroll down to the "GENERAL" group of settings. This is the second large group of settings on the page. Image titled Allow Pop ups Step 58 4 Tap the green "Block Pop-ups" switch Image titled Iphoneswitchonicon1.png . It's near the bottom of the "GENERAL" section of settings. The switch will turn white Image titled Iphoneswitchofficon.png , signifying that your iPhone's Safari app will no longer block pop-ups.
